cis.monopoly.gamePlay

Class CardDeck

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis.monopoly.gamePlay.CardDeck

  • public class CardDeck
extends java.lang.Object

    CardDeck

    This is the class that hold all of the cards. It contains a stack that holds all of the cards for each separate deck, and it performs the operations the card provides.
    Version:
    0.7
    Author:
    Kyle Turske
